name: BOSS MAZE
description:
Game Info: You are stuck in a maze, along with a lot of enemies! Your target is to reach to your destination (marked on your map), before getting killed. If you are stuck, You have a spell - [Show Path], which shows the path to your destination on your map and game both. But you can use it for limited no. of times only. ****Controls**** 

WASD : Move

 Middle Mouse button : Open/Close doors 

Mouse Scroll: Zoom in/out mini map 

M: Show Map 

Tab: Show Destination Path 

Esc: Show info box

 R: Reload the game
